title: Silca makes your chain faster by polishing it with Diamonds
content:
What’s faster than Silca’s Secret Blend waxed chains? A chain polished for three days with diamond dust and then coated with their Secret Blend wax treatment! New Silca Diamond Polished & Waxed Chain kits are now being offered for every major road, gravel & mountain bike drivetrain, promising an instantaneous drag reduction upgrade to make […]

The post Silca makes your chain faster by polishing it with Diamonds appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
